div.style: align-items: center; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); display: flex; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 30px; font-weight: bold; height: 100%; line-height: 1.2; justify-content: center; padding: 0.5em; text-align: center; width: 100%;

foreignObject.div: Well, hello there! Long time no see!
